text: Heda Čechová (July 17, 1928 – April 23, 2020) was a Czech television anchorwoman, radio presenter, and politician. She was a member of the Czech National Council for the Civic Forum from 1990 until 1992 following the Velvet Revolution and Czechoslovakia's transition to democracy. She was born in Prague. Čechová died on April 23, 2020 in Prague, at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Czech politicians Category:Entertainers from Prague Category:Radio personalities Category:Television news anchors
title: Heda Čechová
